```{python, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, results="asis", warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
sys.path.append('../../../assets/python')

from ctns_make import ctns_make as CTNS_MAKE
from ctns      import ctns as CTNS
```

```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
print(CTNS_MAKE(
  target = [
      "linearQ2-2"
    , "test-linearQ2-2-v2"
    , "linearQ2-3"
    , "linearQ2-4"
    , "linearQ2-4b"
    , "linearQ2-5"
    , "linearQ2-6"
    , "linearQ2-7"
    , "linearQ2-8"
    , "linearQ2-9"
    , "linearQ9-1"
  ]
  ))
```

```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

b = [  "linearQ2-2"
     , "linearQ2-2, linearQ2-2, linearQ2-3, linearQ2-4, linearQ2-4b"
     #, "linearQ2-2"
     #, "linearQ2-2"
     , "linearQ2-3"
     , "linearQ2-4"
     , "linearQ2-4b"
     , "linearQ2-3, linearQ2-4b"
    ]
for p in b:
    print(CTNS(
        target = [ p ], 
        image_target = p,
        #write_file = False,
        write_image = False,
        skip_image = True,
        #action="ctns_make",
        opt_ctns = [
          "dynamic",
          "qa",
          "quiz_css='width:100%;'", 
          "no_reference",
          "flush"
        ]))
```
